name: Syndicate Plus
overview:
Syndicate Plus was founded in 2011 by Pieter van Herpen. Frustrated about the lack of transparency in the Food & Beverages industry he started collecting product data which he used to launch several popular shopper guidance apps.

In 2012 Syndicate Plus launched Foodhouse; an online product information management tool dedicated to helping manufacturers and retailers upload and manage their product data while making the Foodhouse database accessible to third parties like publishers and freelance developers.

Syndicate Plus wants to make every product detail about every consumer product freely accessible to any third party. Starting with Food & Beverages products the company collects product information such as nutritional values, ingredients, consumer reviews, pack shots and pricing data.

Syndicate Plus is based in Amsterdam (The Netherlands) and is privately-funded.
